collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you request a quote, contact us, or subscribe to our newsletter. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and address.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use your information to provide quotes, respond to inquiries, schedule appointments, and send you updates about our services. We never sell your personal information to third parties.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us to exercise these rights.
